items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

content.body:
### Shop 11R-22.5 Tire Size
11R-22.5 tires are commonly found on larger trucks such as semi-trucks, dump trucks, and so on. A popular tire size, 11R-22.5 tires are available for regional, urban, long haul, and mixed service applications, and can also be used on RVs and Coach/Buses.

All-position tires can be used on every axle of a truck, making them a popular choice for drivers or owners and operators who like versatility. Check out the [Continental HSR2](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/hsr2), Firestone FS560 Plus, or GT Radial GSR135FE if you’re looking for an all-position tire for your commercial truck.

Drive axle tires are vital to traction, so finding a good one becomes a must. Consider the Michelin XDN 2, [Kumho KLD02](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/kld02), or Sumitomo ST938 if you need an 11R-22.5 drive axle tire that offers strong traction and performance.

As their name suggests, steer axle tires control the steering and handling performance on a semi-truck. Take a look at the Falken RI 150, Toyo M177, and [Hankook AM09](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/am09) if you want a set of 11R-22.5 tires that offers great handling.

Trailer tires go on the back of a semi-truck and need to be strong enough to carry heavy loads while also being able to withstand excess lateral and braking force. Look into the Goodyear Marathon LHT,[Michelin X Line Energy T2](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/x-line-energy-t2), or Toyo M157 if you’re looking for a great 11R-22.5 tire for the steer axle of your truck.

Whether you need an all-position, drive, steer, trailer or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 11R-22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!
